refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: s=quart(x) s=quart(x,'r') or m=quart(x,1) s=quart(x,'c') or m=quart(x,2)

listitem.para: real or complex vector or matrix

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
For a vector or a matrix x, [q]=quart(x,y) returns in the vector q the quartiles of x.
[q]=quart(x,'r') (or, equivalently, [q]=quart(x,1)) are the rowwise percentiles. It returns in each column of the matrix q the quartiles of data in the corresponding column of x.
[q]=quart(x,'c') (or, equivalently, [q]=quart(x,2)) are the columnwise quartiles. It returns in each row of the matrix q the quartiles of data in the corresponding row of x.
